name: The Pursuit of Nappiness
description:
For Game Jam 2019

Programming-Tommy San Miguel, Tiger Jia

Art-Sheenu You

Sound-Aiden Peck

Press mouse to move character. Swipe to attack.

Swipe and dash into objects that produce noise to turn them off. If you get hit by too many sound waves or dash too many times, you will get angry and burn the house down. Don't let that happen! Rest yourself by standing still or standing on the bed or couch.
